abstract: More evidence against vitamin use, why layaway isn't such a good deal, putting boxed wine to the taste test and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: More evidence against vitamin use, why layaway isn't such a good deal, putting boxed wine to the taste test and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: More Evidence Against Vitamin Use
